name: DailySignal
text:
Extended #COVID19 lockdowns are posing a serious threat to mental health.

Have you noticed it taking a toll on you or the people you love? https://t.co/f0OMqryEkU

name: DailySignal
text:
NOT AGAIN: A statue of Frederick Douglass was ripped from its base—on the anniversary and on the spot where he delivered one of his most famous speeches in 1852

Here's what everyone needs to know about his “What to the Slave is the Fourth of July” speech: https://t.co/fkBHkrFr8R https://t.co/dxDYJAYOBW

name: DailySignal
text: “While I do not believe for a moment democracy is fragile, it does require careful stewardship and constant vigilance.” @SecPompeo  https://t.co/0zurxYqzRL

name: DailySignal
text:
#SCOTUS reaffirmed what most Americans take for granted—that the Constitution prohibits religious discrimination. 

But the 5-4 divide among the justices shows that religious freedom is not fully secure in America: https://t.co/VPjoMp3yh3
